|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |ethoui = 00:50:BF

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The SMC supplier P/N of this card is 99-012084-99.
"P/N: 141122620100B REV: 02" is silkscreened on the board of the card populating this entry. :The radial capacitors on this board are all '''JACKCON''' branded.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
